member.name: T:Penumbra.String.ByteString
member.summary: A wrapper around unsafe byte strings that can either be owned or allocated in unmanaged space.
member.remarks:
Unowned strings may change their value and thus become corrupt, so they should not be stored without cloning.
The string keeps track of whether it is owned or not, being pure ASCII, ASCII-lowercase, or null-terminated.
Owned strings are always null-terminated.
Any constructed string will compute its own CRC32-value (as long as the string itself is not changed).

member.name: P:Penumbra.String.ByteString.IsNullTerminated
member.summary: Returns whether the current string is known to be null-terminated.

member.name: P:Penumbra.String.ByteString.IsOwned
member.summary: Returns whether the current string is owned, i.e. allocated in unmanaged space.

member.name: P:Penumbra.String.ByteString.IsAscii
member.summary: Returns whether the current string consists purely of ASCII characters.
member.remarks: This information is cached.

member.name: P:Penumbra.String.ByteString.IsAsciiLowerCase
member.summary: Returns whether the current string contains only ASCII lower-case or non-ASCII characters.
member.remarks: This information is cached.

member.name: P:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Path
member.summary: Returns the pointer to the actual memory of the string.

member.name: P:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Crc32
member.summary: Returns the CRC32 value of the string.
member.remarks: This value is computed on construction and stored.

member.name: P:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Length
member.summary: Returns the length of the string.

member.name: P:Penumbra.String.ByteString.IsEmpty
member.summary: Returns whether the string is empty.

member.name: P:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Span
member.summary: Returns a ReadOnlySpan to the actual memory of the string using its length, without null-terminator.

member.summary: Access a specific byte in the string by index.
member.param: The index of the requested byte.
member.exception: Thrown if is less than 0 or larger than the string.

member.returns: Whether this string and are equal.

member.returns: Whether this string and the object are equal.

member.param: The string to compare with.
member.returns: Whether this string and are equal ignoring (ASCII) case.

member.param: The string to compare with.
member.returns: Whether this string is lexicographically smaller (less than 0), bigger (greater than 0) or equal (0) to .

member.param: The string to compare with.
member.returns: Whether this string is lexicographically smaller (less than 0), bigger (greater than 0) or equal (0) to ignoring (ASCII) case.

member.returns: Whether this string has as a suffix.

member.summary: Find the first occurrence of in this string.
member.param: The needle.
An optional starting index in this string.
member.returns: The index of the first occurrence of after or -1 if it is not found.

member.summary: Find the last occurrence of in this string.
member.param: The needle.
An optional stopping index in this string.
member.returns: The index of the last occurrence of before or -1 if it is not found.

member.name: F:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Null
member.summary: Statically allocated null-terminator for empty strings to point to.

member.name: F:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Empty
member.summary: An empty string of length 0 that is null-terminated.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new empty string.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.#ctor(System.Byte*)
member.summary: Create a temporary ByteString from a byte pointer.
member.param: A pointer to an existing string.
member.remarks: This computes CRC, checks for ASCII and AsciiLower and assumes Null-Termination.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.FromByteStringUnsafe(System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Construct a temporary ByteString from a given byte string of known size.
member.param: A pointer to an existing string.
The known length of the string.
Whether the string is known to be null-terminated or not.
Optionally, whether the string is known to only contain (ASCII) lower-case characters.
Optionally, whether the string is known to only contain ASCII characters.
member.remarks: Always computes the CRC32 for the path.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.FromString(System.String,Penumbra.String.ByteString@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Construct an ByteString from a given unicode string, possibly converted to ascii lowercase.
member.param: The existing UTF16 string.
The converted, owned ByteString on success, an empty string on failure.
Optionally, whether to convert the string to lower-case.
member.returns: False if the resulting length is larger than .

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.FromStringUnsafe(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Construct an ByteString from a given unicode string without checking for length, and assuming from the argument.
member.param: The existing UTF16 string.
Whether the string is known to be (ASCII) lower-case.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.ReleaseUnmanagedResources
member.summary: Free memory if the string is owned.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Dispose
member.summary: Manually free memory. Sets the string to an empty string, also updates CRC32.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Finalize
member.summary: Automatic release of memory if not disposed before.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Setup(System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Setup from all given values.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.CheckAscii
member.summary: Check if the string is known to be or not be ASCII, otherwise test for it and store it in the cache.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.CheckAsciiLower
member.summary: Check if the string is known to be or not be (ASCII) lower-case, otherwise test for it and store it in the cache.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.ToString
member.summary: Create a C# UTF16 string from this string.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.AsciiToLower
member.summary: Convert the ASCII portion of the string to lowercase.
member.remarks: Only creates a new string and copy if the string is not already known to be lower case.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.AsciiToMixed
member.summary: Convert the ascii portion of the string to mixed case (i.e. capitalize every first letter in a word)
member.remarks: Always creates an owned copy of the string.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.AsciiToLowerClone
member.summary: Convert the ASCII portion of the string to lowercase.
member.remarks: Guaranteed to create an owned copy.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Clone
member.summary: Create an owned copy of the given string.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Substring(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a non-owning substring from the given position.
member.param: The starting position.
member.remarks: If from is negative or too large, the returned string will be the empty string.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Substring(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a non-owning substring from the given position of the given length.
member.param: The starting position.
The total length.
member.remarks:
If from is negative or too large, the returned string will be the empty string.
If from + length is too large, it will be the same as if length was not specified.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.TrimFront
member.summary: Trim all ascii whitespace characters from the front.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.TrimEnd
member.summary: Trim all ascii whitespace characters at the end.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Trim
member.summary: Trim all ascii whitespace characters from the beginning or end of the string.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Replace(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Create a owned copy of the string and replace all occurrences of from with to in it.
member.param: The byte to replace.
The byte is to be replaced with.

member.summary: Join a number of strings with a given byte between them.
member.param: The byte to insert between all strings.
The list of strings to join.
member.remarks: No is inserted before the first or after the last string.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Join(Penumbra.String.ByteString[])
member.summary: Join a number of strings with a given byte between them.
member.param: The list of strings to join.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.ByteString.Split(System.Byte,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Split a string and return a list of the substrings delimited by b.
member.param: An optional maximum number of splits - if the maximum is reached, the last substring may contain delimiters.
Remove all empty substrings between delimiters, they are also not counted for .
member.remarks: The returned substrings are not owned.

members.member: Combine two optional bools into a new optional bool.

member.name: T:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath
member.summary: A combination of a C#-string for filesystem interactions and a lower-case ByteString for FFXIV interactions. Also stores the FFXIV-CRC64 value.

member.name: F:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.FullName
member.summary: The Unicode string containing the full name of the path with backward-slashes.

member.name: F:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.InternalName
member.summary: The UTF8 string containing the full name of the path with forward-slashes.

member.name: F:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.Crc64
member.summary: The FFXIV specific Crc64 value, i.e. a CRC32 of the file name combined with a CRC32 of the file path.

member.name: F:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.Empty
member.summary: An empty string.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.#ctor(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8RelPath)
member.summary: Combine a relative path with a base directory for a full path.

member.summary: Create a full path from a given file path.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a full path from a given string.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.#ctor(Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath)
member.summary: Create a full path from a given game path.

member.summary: Check whether the file exists on your file system.

member.name: P:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.Extension
member.summary: Get the file extension of the file.

member.name: P:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.Name
member.summary: Get only the file name of the file.

member.summary: Use the given directory path to obtain a game path.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.ToRelPath(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8RelPath@)
member.summary: Use the given directory path to obtain path relative to it.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Compare lexicographically against another FullPath, FileInfo, ByteString or string.
member.remarks: Comparison against FileInfo and string ignore case, comparisons against FullPath and ByteString do not, but use the InternalName.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.Equals(Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath)
member.summary: Check if two FullPaths are equal.

member.summary: Returns whether the path is rooted.

member.summary: Return the CRC32 of the InternalName.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.ToString
member.summary: Return the FullName.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.ToPath
member.summary: Return the path with back slashes if it is rooted and with forward-slashes if not.

member.name: T:Penumbra.String.Classes.FullPath.FullPathConverter
member.summary: Convert from and to string.

member.name: T:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath
member.summary: A GamePath that verifies some invariants based on a ByteString. The Invariants are being smaller than , and containing forward-slashes as separators.

member.name: F:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.MaxGamePathLength
member.summary: The maximum length Penumbra accepts.

member.name: F:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.Path
member.summary: Return the original path.

member.name: F:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.Empty
member.summary: An empty path.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.ToLower
member.summary: Return a path that consists only of lower-case ASCII characters. Non-ASCII characters are left untouched.
member.remarks: The new string is not guaranteed to be a copy. If the original string was lower-case, no copy is created.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.FromPointer(System.Byte*,Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new Utf8GamePath from a pointer.
member.param: The data.
The resulting game path if successful, an empty path otherwise.
Whether to turn the path into lower-case ASCII.
member.returns: Whether the given pointer is a valid Utf8GamePath.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.FromSpan(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Same as just with known length.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.ReturnChecked(Penumbra.String.ByteString,Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Does not check for Forward/Backslashes due to assuming that SE-strings use the correct one. Does not check for initial slashes either, since they are assumed to be by choice. Checks for maxlength and lowercase.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.FromString(System.String,Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new path from a string.
member.param: The given string.
The converted path or an empty path on failure.
Whether the string should be (ASCII) lower-cased.
member.returns: False if the string is too long, or can not be converted to UTF8.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.FromByteString(Penumbra.String.ByteString,Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new path from a string and check its length.
member.param: The given string.
The string as UTF8GamePath, empty string on failure or null input.
Whether the string should be (ASCII) lower-cased.
member.returns: False if the string is too long.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.FromFile(System.IO.FileInfo,System.IO.DirectoryInfo,Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new path from a file and a base directory.
member.param: The file path to convert.
The directory to which the file path should be seen as relative.
The converted path or an empty path on failure.
Whether the string should be (ASCII) lower-cased.
member.returns: False if the file does not lie inside the base directory or the string conversion fails.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.Filename
member.summary: Get the non-owned substring of the file name of the path.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.Extension
member.summary: Get the non-owned substring of the extension of the path.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.IsRooted(Penumbra.String.ByteString)
member.summary: Return whether the path is rooted.

member.name: T:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath.Utf8GamePathConverter
member.summary: Conversion from and to string.

member.name: T:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8RelPath
member.summary: A relative path that verifies some invariants based on an UTF8 string. Similar to Utf8GamePath just kept for filesystem interaction instead of FFXIV interaction.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8RelPath.op_Explicit(System.String)~Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8RelPath
member.summary: Explicit conversion from string to Utf8RelPath for migrating old dictionaries.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8RelPath.#ctor(Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8GamePath)
member.summary: Create a new RelPath from a GamePath by replacing all forward slashes with backward slashes.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Classes.Utf8RelPath.ToGamePath(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert to Utf8GamePath by replacing all backward slashes with forward slashes, and turning to lower case.
member.param: Optionally skip the first few folders in the conversion.

member.summary: Convert a C# unicode-string to an unmanaged UTF8-byte array and return the pointer. If the length would exceed the given maxLength, return a nullpointer instead.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Functions.ByteStringFunctions.ComputeCrc64(System.String)
member.summary: Compute the FFXIV-CRC64 value of a UTF16 string.
member.remarks: The FFXIV-CRC64 consists of the CRC32 of the string up to the last '/' in the lower bytes, and the CRC32 of the string from the last '/' in the upper bytes.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Functions.ByteStringFunctions.ComputeCrc64(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Compute the FFXIV-CRC64 value of a UTF8 string.

member.summary: Compute the FFXIV-CRC64 value, the CRC32 value, the ASCII state and the Lowercase state while iterating only once.

member.name: M:Penumbra.String.Functions.ByteStringFunctions.ComputeCrc32AsciiLowerAndSize(System.Byte*,System.Int32@,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Compute the CRC32 value, the ASCII state and the Lowercase state while iterating only once.

member.summary: Replace all occurrences of from in a byte array of known length with to.

member.summary: Copy a byte array and convert the copy to ASCII-lowercase.
